sentence.Network_en: to be guilty of complicity in the murder
She did not suspect him of complicity with the authorities.
sentence.Network_cn: 她没怀疑他会与当局串通.

sentence.Network_en: He denied complicity in the murder.
sentence.Network_cn: 他否认自己曾参与谋杀.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 一些翻译~（转的~） ... commute a sentence 减刑 complicity 共谋，共犯 concussive grenade 振荡手榴弹.
英语专四词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... compliance n. 依从，顺从 complicity n. 同谋，共犯 complementary adj. 补充的，补足的.
gre词汇精选（最新词汇） - 豆丁网 ... complexion 肤色；外表特征 complicity 合谋，串通 compulsory 强制性的，命令性的.
gre词汇精选（最新词汇） - 豆丁网 ... complexion 肤色；外表特征 complicity 合谋，串通 compulsory 强制性的，命令性的.

list.abs: 雅思词汇表_百度文库 ... complex 合成的；复杂的 complicate 使复杂；使陷入 composition 写作；组成.
英语常见词根前缀后缀大全 ... duplicate 二倍的，副本 complication 综合症；并发症；复杂 implicit 含蓄的.
新概念英语第三册词汇_百度文库 ... dedicated a. 潜心的 complicated a. 复杂的 dilapidated a. (房屋等)坍坏了的.
这麽复杂（complicated）、综合（comprehensive）、多层（complex）的问题，肯定没有一揽子解决方案；只能一个案例一个案例 …
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(29) _ 上海疯狂英语 ... complication 复杂 complice 同伙 complicity 同谋.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from Middle English complice 'an associate', from Old French, from late Latin complex, complic- 'allied', from Latin complicare 'fold together' (see complicate). Compare with accomplice

entry.def: Complicity is involvement with other people in an illegal activity or plan.

example.ex: Recently a number of policemen were sentenced to death for their complicity in the murder...
example.tran: 最近，几名警察因串谋杀人被判处死刑。

example.ex: He is accused of complicity with the leader of the coup, former Colonel Gregorio Honasan.
example.tran: 他被控与政变首领——前上校格雷戈里奥·霍纳桑——串通一气。

means.word_mean: 1. guilt as an accomplice in a crime or offense

auth_sentence.content: Trovoada arrested, accused of complicity in coup attempt.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Trovoada arrested, accused of complicity in coup attempt.

auth_sentence.res_content: One advantage the abortion lobby has is widespread complicity.

auth_sentence.content: Nor is Celtic plc's complicity able to be ignored.
auth_sentence.res_content: Nor is Celtic plc's complicity able to be ignored.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Nor is Celtic plc's complicity able to be ignored.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =fold,表示"重叠,重复"; 2. 折; 3. 弯

stems_affixes.word_buile: complicate使..复杂+ed……的→adj.复杂的, 难解的
ex出+plic重叠,重复+able可以……的→能把重叠的东西弄出来→可解释的→explicate形容词
im进入+plic重叠+it→进入重叠→不直说→含蓄的
ac加强+com+plic重叠,重复+e→共同重叠在一起做事→同谋
complicate弄复杂+ion表名词→complication复杂,纠纷
com共同+plic重叠,重复+ity表名词→共同重叠→同谋的关系
re再+plic重叠,重复+a表名词→再重叠[一分]的[东西]→复制品
com全部+plic重叠,重复+ate使……→全部重叠起来→弄复杂
ex出+plic重叠,重复+ate使……→把重叠的东西弄出来→解释
ex出,往外+ploit=plic重叠+it→把折叠之物展开→使用

stems_affixes.value_cn: 牵连[于罪行中],含蓄表达
stems_affixes.word_buile: im进入+plic重叠,重复+ate表动词→[说话]进入重叠,不直说→含蓄表达
re再+plic重叠,重复+ate表动词→再重叠[一分]→复制

sentences.en: the complicity between the army and drug smugglers
sentences.cn: 军队和贩毒分子之间的串通

sentences.en: He denied complicity in the murder.
sentences.cn: 他否认自己曾参与谋杀。

sentences.en: She suspected him of complicity in Ashok’s escape.
sentences.cn: 她怀疑他参与了阿肖克的逃跑密谋。

sentences.en: She did not suspect him of complicity with the authorities.
sentences.cn: 她没怀疑他会与当局串通。
